snippet.title: Undertale Green Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Welcome to Undertale Green, a fanmade prequel to Toby Fox’s Undertale in the same style as Undertale Yellow and the like! In this adventure, you follow the journey of the soul of kindness, Olive, as they embark on a journey of self-discovery. Along the way, they'll come across brand new faces and places while going head to head with a previously unseen threat to the underground!

We are pleased to announce the development of Undertale Green! While there is not much to share now, we will be posting semi-frequent updates right on this channel. All art and soundtracks are highly subject to change at this point in development.

On behalf of the team, we hope you’re looking forward to hearing more! 💚

For more constant updates, join our Discord server!
Link:  https://discord.gg/YhxkaHfrZN


#undertale #undertalefangame #undertalegreen
